body:
Hello am Cord.

Recently there was a post containing the new rotations for the server. After much discussion about the future of Avicus, we are going down a path that is catered more strategic advertising and community enjoyment.  Through this, we had an extensive talk about what each gamemode could fulfill and best ways to advertise it to a larger audience. But, we do not want to forget about our current community as we want to cater these new rotations towards you guys as a group. So our first step is to see what a little bit of the community wants as prime gamemodes.  Gamemodes of the future and past are on this list with a choice to comment on other gamemodes here if you wish. This is also a multiple choice strawpoll so please choose all the gamemodes that you would like to play on Avicus and leave the ones blank for the gamemodes you do not like. This is the link to the poll. 
Please vote, this is the future of Avicus and you have a role in shaping it. 

Also yes I am tryharding for the head of social media team.

title: (Poll) What Gamemodes do You Like on Avicus?

replies.body:
I'd say DTM CTW CTF KOTH 5CP

Not sure how Pubs KOTH or 5CP would work, but it could be helpful in introducing people into the gamemode.

Also before introducing anything new make sure the plugin works fine and is fixed properly if there were any errors
